#summary deltaforce - applies any updates from a delta extract onto a full extract

= Usage =

`deltaforce <options> file1 file2`

if one of file1 or file2 is specified as \"-\", stdin will be used for that input stream.

= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-v||--verbose|| ||print verbose messages during execution||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||delimiting string for both input files||
||-o||--outfile||<outfile> ||name of file for output||
||-k||--keys||<keys> ||indexes of primary key field(s) in both input files (default: 1)||
||-K||--key-labels||<key_labels> ||labels of primary key field(s) in both input files||
